comments.body:
Can we .. 

1.  make `QueryTest.checkAnswer` private so that it can only be called in its companion class `QueryTest`
2. and avoid to call `checkAnswer` in the `QueryTest` object in the tests

?

I think @HyukjinKwon's suggestion would be better for future modification in point of preventing the cause, if there's no actual usage of `QueryTest.checkAnswer` from outside of `QueryTest`. (I guess it might have been misused like this PR fixes...)

comments.body: Is it ok that we only have the space in the file name, or do we need it in the path were providing to trigger SPARK-28030?
this test will fail without the patch

comments.body: The change seems to impact not just the binary file format, maybe this belongs in one of our root datasource tests. What do you think?

it still relies on each data source implementation to recognize `filePath` is actually an URI. I don't see how to test it in our root datasource test. Btw, this PR adds a regression test. So I want to keep the scope minimal.
